featureDescription: This is just a temporary card to show how an actual video looks in these cards.
Users can see which artist they listen to the most! This is measured by the number of songs in their playlists by that artist.
The artist has a profile from which they can upload songs to the database, to share with other users.
Users can quickly browse the database for whatever song they want to listen to.
Our app has a database full of music available for all users.
A logged-in user can create and remove playlists.
Users can change between a dark and a light mode in the app's settings.
The user can play music in the app. The Music Player allows for full user control: volume control, skipping, going back, seeking, playing and pausing music.
The user can sort songs in their playlists by title or artist.
Our app allows users to log in and create playlists with their favourite songs.
Our app allows non-artist users to upload songs that they have in their local storage and mix them in playlists with songs from the database.
